alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:17PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern El Paso County through 400 PM MDT... At 317 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Schriever AFB, or 17 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Colorado Springs, Fountain, Hanover, Truckton, Yoder, Ellicott, Schriever AFB, Peterson AFB, Cimarron Hills and Security-Widefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
